column5: Not much of a report to read but I do have some pictures to share!        Video- landing rainbow  Chillin around the fire!         My only whitie one long afternoon        My favourite eats!        Seen some elk just east of the Soo last week. There was a big bull that I wish I could of taken a picture of but couldn't stop in time. I did manage a blurry pic of a few others. It was taken out the window of a moving vehicle....    Also had this guy flying around us for awhile getting ready for the upcoming forest fire season  Water Bomber  Bring on the open water!  TDunn
Thanks for sharing them pics TDunn Some great looking mix bag of fishes Enjoyed watching the video
Nice shootin.  It's been awesome weather to cap off the hardwater season.
Great pics, awesome colours on the rainbows.  Neat to see the elk, I had no idea they were in that area.
Beautiful Tyler !!! Well everything but those "plane swatters" on the ridge top !
Nice!!  Congrats on the mixed bag and good day
Ben- Ya there is a herd east of the Soo. There may even be another further east somewhere around Iron Bridge... I think....   Thanks everyone

Cool Tyler, rainbows through the ice aren't all that common.  I've seen Elk a couple times S/W of Sudbury while fishing the Bad River area. I think there's a release site in that general vicinity.  Nice to see they're gaining a foothold.
Great pics and video Tyler. specially the video...you know how partial i am to the moving image
nice shootin' buddy! Keep in up!
is it a pike right on top of perches? the head shape looks slight different from that of a pike...
That second rainbow is stunning...love the brilliant red stripe!!!!
Good stuff man.  I always enjoy your pictures.
Yup thats a northern....nice and chunky!  Thanks to everyone else again for all the awesome replies!
Quit posting reports, you're making me jealous   Good show man...
